title: Mannequins in the making [excerpt from Australian Colour Diary No. 024]
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Models, Fashion
abstract: A short quirky film made in the 1960's illustrating how young women train as models for the fashion industry.
description: Filmed between 1957 and 1971, the Australian Colour Diary series records how Australians have lived, worked and played over the years. This model school helps develop poise and personality and each pupil soon learns the difference between correct dressing and overdressing!
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003098; Aspects in Fashion; Active; 2015
